commit message: Minor corrections in Str ings FR

Update tutorial_r4.xml

French corrections from introduction to operations
correct structure and position of menuchoice

use the singelton MyApplication instance, instead of calling getApplicationcontext
maybe prevent rare occassions of crashes on startup, see  http://stackoverflow.com/questions/10311537/android-to-unable-to-instantiate-application-java-lang-classnotfoundexception
ask for confirmation when restoring backup upon initial install
setup needed also when we did not find a backup
backup needs to be called with action
restore moved to application class, close db before restore, and reopen after
finally resolved flickering problem in light theme
first step at linking to contrib app
remove commented out code and unused string res
save space when description is empty
first step at swiping through accounts
second step at swiping through accounts
third step at swiping through accounts
update show_detail_command to make independent from mExpensesCursor
notify data change and config buttons where necessary
remember current and last account upon page select
neeed to finish Backup activity on dialog cancel, otherwise user finds himself for nonreacting screen
update ui when returning from pref
code indentation and padding for heading in expenses list
display aggregate financial situation in account list, issue #51
aggregate over accounts changed to contrib feature; add callback for dialog cancel to interface
use same callback for two cases, where feature is not called: when user clicks on buy or when he cancels the dialog
handle case when no free usages are left
reconfigure aggregate button when accounts are deleted, added or changed
unlock contrib features through simple licence key mechanism
finally settle for storing usage count in standard pref file
store contrib secret in app properties
finalize move from donate to contrib
show different dialog if already contrib and refactor strings
new contrib feature: editing of templates

version info now spannable, hence store it in application class, since it can not be put into the bundle,put contrib button in button bar of help dialog, learn_more not needed, when pointing to contrib at play
do not restore when user says no
refactor table names into constants, store usage count in db
nothing to record if contrib enabled
in the rare occasion that the version dialog is not immediatly dismissed, and the user comes back to the app, after it has been killed by Android, if  mVersionInfo is not initialized, we get a NPE
use normal text, bold only for heading
use Premium instead of Contrib as label for features
